timeline.bodyText: org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.GridCacheProcessor#cache use the cache name as an argument, but you pass schema name. How this will work?
timeline.author: nva

replies.bodyText: Expected that cache name will be sent and its context will be used.
replies.author: vsisko

timeline.bodyText: Let's add test where schema is removed from query and set we set default schema
timeline.author: nva
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -365,7 +453,7 @@ public void shouldReturnRunningQueriesFromAllNodes() {
                         .setQueryId(UUID.randomUUID().toString())
                         .setQueryText("SELECT count(*), sleep() AS \"" + nid + "\" FROM \"TestCache\".STRING")
                         .setPageSize(1)
-                        .setCacheName("TestCache")
+                        .setDefaultSchema("TestCache")

replies.bodyText:
This variant is already implemented in my test:
getSelectQuery(fullTestTable) + getSelectQuery(testTable)
replies.author: vsisko
